name: gh-pages-deploy-sample
description: Basic project to practice gh-pages deploy automation

scripts.gh:clean: rimraf %npm_package_config_build% && git worktree prune && git branch -D gh-pages && git push -d %npm_package_config_remote% gh-pages
scripts.gh:init:remote: git checkout --orphan gh-pages && git rm -rfq . && git push %npm_package_config_remote% gh-pages
scripts.gh:init: npm run gh:init:remote && npm run gh:init:local
scripts.gh:deploy: npm run build && cd %npm_package_config_build% && git add --all && git commit -m "%npm_package_config_msg%" && git push

author: Javier Calzado
